attendanceStatusClockedIn.description: Label to use when the user is clocked-in to Keka.

attendanceStatusClockedOut.description: Label to use when the user is clocked-out of Keka.

attendanceStatusError.description: Label to use if an error occurred while determining whether the user is clocked-in or clocked-out of Keka.

attendanceStatusLoading.description: Label to use while determining whether the user is clocked-in or clocked-out of Keka.

attendanceTimeError.description: Label to use if an error occurred while retrieving the time spent clocked-in to Keka today.

attendanceToggle.description: Text to display on the attendance toggle button.

extensionDescription.message: Clock-in/out of Keka without leaving your current tab.

optionsSubdomainDescription.message: If your Keka is 'https://example.keka.com', then enter 'example' below.
optionsSubdomainDescription.description: Description of how to retrieve and set the Keka subdomain setting.

optionsSubdomainTitle.description: Title for the section for setting the user's company's Keka subdomain.

optionsSubdomainInvalid.message: Please enter a valid subdomain. If the hostname is 'example.keka.com', enter 'example' only.
optionsSubdomainInvalid.description: Message to display if the user enters an invalid subdomain.

optionsExtensionPermissionsTitle.description: Title for the section which lists the current availability of each permission required by the extension.

popupCreatedBy.description: Label for the UI link which opens my GitHub profile.

popupCurrently.description: Label displayed to the left of attendanceStatusClockedIn/attendanceStatusClockedOut.

popupFailedToToggleAttendance.description: Notification message to display if there is a failure clocking-in or clocking-out of Keka.

popupFailedToRefreshToken.message: Failed to refresh API token. Are you logged-in to Keka?
popupFailedToRefreshToken.description: Notification message to display if the API token cannot be refreshed.

popupFailedNoSubdomainSet.message: Keka subdomain has not been set. Please set it in the extension settings.
popupFailedNoSubdomainSet.description: Notification message to display if the Keka subdomain setting has not been set.

popupOptions.description: Label for the UI link which opens the options page.

popupTimeClocked.description: Label displayed to the left of the amount of time spent clocked-in to Keka today.

clockOutReminderMessage.message: You have been clocked-in for more than 8 hours. Consider clocking-out now.
clockOutReminderMessage.description: Notification message displayed when user has been clocked-in for 8+ hours.

clockOutReminderTitle.description: Title for the clock-out reminder notification.

optionsAutoClockTitle.description: Title for the automatic clock-in/out settings section.

optionsAutoClockDescription.message: Set times to automatically clock-in and clock-out, Monday to Friday, using your local time.
optionsAutoClockDescription.description: Description for the automatic clock-in/out feature.

optionsAutoClockInLabel.description: Label for the clock-in time input.

optionsAutoClockOutLabel.description: Label for the clock-out time input.

optionsAutoClockInEnabledLabel.description: Label for the enable auto clock-in checkbox.

optionsAutoClockOutEnabledLabel.description: Label for the enable auto clock-out checkbox.
